articles.title: European Rivals Given 'Clear Advantage' Over Manchester City in Race to Sign Paul Pogba - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Clubs around Europe have been handed a 'clear advantage' over Manchester City in the race to sign Paul Pogba, according to a recent report.
articles.content:
Around a month ago, club captain Fernandinho stunned fans and journalists alike when he announced he intends to leave Manchester City this summer, upon the expiry of his contract.

articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: Chelsea Soccer Club Sold To U.S.-Led Investors, Ending Ownership By Russian Oligarch Abramovich - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The British soccer club Chelsea will be sold to a group of investors led by an American billionaire, formally ending nearly two decades of ownership by Kremlin-connected oligarch Roman Abramovich.
